name: @knockdog/bridge-core
description: Core types and utilities for bridge communication

scripts.build: pnpm exec bunchee src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --out-dir dist && pnpm exec tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.dev: pnpm exec bunchee src/index.ts --watch --format cjs,esm --dts --out-dir dist
